history.proof: intros H. unfold ex_derive_n, is_derive_n in *. destruct n. - simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_derive_n_unique. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_derive_n_unique.

exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x : R_AbsRing H : True Unable to unify "Derive_n ?M2367 ?M2368 ?M2369 = ?M2370" with "f x = f x".

original: intros H. unfold ex_derive_n, is_derive_n in *. destruct n. - intros _. simpl. apply is_derive_n_unique. apply H. - intros H'. simpl. apply is_derive_n_unique. apply H in H'. apply H'.
